title: Deleting a pics in an activity works on another activity.
body:
#### Expected behavior Pics should be deleted from the activity clicked on. #### Actual behavior The pics doesn't delete on that particular activity, the delete works on pics in another activity at the top. #### How to reproduce Download app from fdroid.
Open and select an activity, then add a pics to it.
Do the same for another activity.
Open the side menu and go to diary.
Delete the pics attached to the former activity which would be below
Notice the pics doesn't shows it's deleted, but the latter one goes off as deleted.
* App: Activity diary. Fdroid store. Version 1.1.8 * Operating system: Android Nougat 7.0 on Tecno K7. #### Recording Of The Bug (https://youtu.be/yadELlLY6sU)
Posted on Utopian.io - Rewarding Open Source Contributors
comments: OMG. Thanks for reporting. This is actually a heavy bug - will fix i for the next release.
